'''21w08b''' is the twelfth [[snapshot]] for [[Java Edition 1.17]], released on February 25, 2021,<ref>{{snap|21w08b|February 25, 2021}}</ref> which fixes two issues with [[ore]] distribution.

{{fixes|fixedin=21w08b
|;dev
